snippet.title: Farming Simulator 2013: The launch trailer!
snippet.description:
More info at http://www.farming-simulator.com
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/giants.farming.simulator
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/farmingsim

Long-awaited by many players around the world, Farming Simulator 2013® will finally release this week in Europe on PC, next week in the UK, and November in the US!

Farming Simulator 2013® also has a new trailer today to celebrate the occasion. This trailer unveils one last peek at the large amount of content and new features offered in the game. From crops to the sale of the harvest, to animal husbandry, players will manage and develop their own farm in a massive new world. Over a hundred farming vehicles and machines will be at players' disposal!

These are just some of the many features offered by Farming Simulator 2013, which are illustrated today in the launch trailer. Players will soon get to discover all of them in just a few day when the game releases on October 25th!

You can order the game here:
http://www.farming-simulator.com/buy-now.php

Amazon.de
http://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B008U3SUYW/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1638&creative=19454&creativeASIN=B008U3SUYW&linkCode=as2&tag=landwirtsimul-21

Amazon.fr:
http://www.amazon.fr/gp/product/B008EH649W/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=wwwskiregions-21&linkCode=as2&camp=1642&creative=19458&creativeASIN=B008EH649W

Amazon.co.uk:
http://www.amazon.co.uk/gp/product/B00962M2J0/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1634&creative=19450&creativeASIN=B00962M2J0&linkCode=as2&tag=officfarmisim-21

Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/220260/
